name: Ragnarok (Algy)
description:
Here is a little game that I made on SRPG maker in one night while learning how to use the software.  It's really short and I was half asleep while making it.  Lead your small band of soldiers through the kingdom of Fargus to slay the evil warlock Ragnarok.  It's free to play if you want.  Probably won't ever make any changes to it LOL. 

Also, as I was half asleep when I made this, I apologize if the dialogue is too cringy to tolerate.
